verses.verse: Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> to all Israel, <WH3478> and said <WH559> to them, <WH8085> Hear, Israel, <WH3478> the statutes <WH2706> and the ordinances <WH4941> which I speak <WH1696> in your ears <WH241> this day, <WH3117> that you may learn <WH3925> them, <WH8104> and observe to do them. <WH6213>
Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with us in Horeb. <WH2722>
Yahweh <WH3068> didn't <WH3772> make this covenant <WH1285> with our fathers, <WH1> but with us, <WH587> even us, <WH587> who are all of us here alive <WH2416> this day. <WH3117>
Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> with you face <WH6440> to face <WH6440> on the mountain <WH2022> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784>

(I stood <WH5975> between Yahweh <WH3068> and you at that time, <WH6256> to show <WH5046> you the word <WH1697> of Yahweh: <WH3068> for you were afraid <WH3372> because <WH6440> of the fire, <WH784> and didn't <WH5927> go up onto the mountain; <WH2022>) saying, <WH559>
"I am Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> who brought you out <WH3318> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH1004> of bondage. <WH5650>
"You shall have no other <WH312> gods <WH430> before me. <WH6440>

"You shall not make <WH6213> an engraved image <WH6459> for yourself, <WH8544> any likeness of what is in heaven <WH8064> above, <WH4605> or what is in the earth <WH776> beneath, <WH4325> or that is in the water under the earth: <WH776>

you shall not bow down <WH7812> yourself to them, <WH5647> nor serve them; <WH3068> for I, Yahweh, your God, <WH430> am a jealous <WH7067> God, <WH430> visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> on the children, <WH1121> and on the third <WH8029> and on the fourth <WH7256> generation of those who hate me; <WH8130>
and showing <WH6213> loving kindness <WH2617> to thousands <WH505> of those who love <WH157> me and keep <WH8104> my commandments. <WH4687>

"You shall not take <WH5375> the name <WH8034> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> in vain: <WH7723> for Yahweh <WH3068> will not hold him guiltless <WH5352> who takes <WH5375> his name <WH8034> in vain. <WH7723>
"Observe <WH8104> the Sabbath <WH7676> day, <WH3117> to keep <WH8104> it holy, <WH3068> as Yahweh your God <WH430> commanded you. <WH6680>
You shall labor <WH5647> six <WH8337> days, <WH3117> and do <WH6213> all your work; <WH4399>

but the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> is a Sabbath <WH7676> to Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> in which you shall not do <WH6213> any work, <WH4399> you, <WH1121> nor your son, nor your daughter, <WH1323> nor your male servant, <WH5650> nor your female servant, <WH519> nor your ox, <WH7794> nor your donkey, <WH2543> nor any of your livestock, <WH929> nor your stranger <WH1616> who is within your gates; <WH8179> that your male servant <WH5650> and your female servant <WH519> may rest as well as you. <WH5117>

You shall remember <WH2142> that you were a servant <WH5650> in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> brought <WH3318> you out of there by a mighty <WH2389> hand <WH3027> and by an outstretched <WH5186> arm: <WH2220> therefore Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> you to keep <WH6213> the Sabbath <WH7676> day. <WH3117>

"Honor <WH3513> your father <WH1> and your mother, <WH517> as Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> commanded <WH6680> you; <WH3117> that your days may be long, <WH748> and that it may go well <WH3190> with you, <WH127> in the land which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> gives you. <WH5414>
"You shall not murder. <WH7523>
"Neither shall you commit adultery. <WH5003>
"Neither shall you steal. <WH1589>
"Neither shall you give <WH6030> false <WH7723> testimony <WH5707> against your neighbor. <WH7453>

"Neither shall you covet <WH2530> your neighbor <WH7453>'s wife; <WH802> neither shall you desire <WH183> your neighbor <WH7453>'s house, <WH1004> his field, <WH7704> or his male servant, <WH5650> or his female servant, <WH519> his ox, <WH7794> or his donkey, <WH2543> or anything that is your neighbor <WH7453>'s."

These words <WH1697> Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to all your assembly <WH6951> on the mountain <WH2022> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784> of the cloud, <WH6051> and of the thick darkness, <WH6205> with a great <WH1419> voice: <WH6963> and he added no more. <WH3254> He wrote <WH3789> them on two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> and gave them to me. <WH5414>

It happened, <WH8085> when you heard the voice <WH6963> out of the midst <WH8432> of the darkness, <WH2822> while the mountain <WH2022> was burning <WH1197> with fire, <WH784> that you came near <WH7126> to me, <WH7218> even all the heads of your tribes, <WH7626> and your elders; <WH2205>

and you said, <WH559> "Behold, <WH3068> Yahweh our God <WH430> has shown <WH7200> us his glory <WH3519> and his greatness, <WH1433> and we have heard <WH8085> his voice <WH6963> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire: <WH784> we have seen <WH7200> this day <WH3117> that God <WH430> does speak <WH1696> with man, <WH120> and he lives. <WH2425>

Now therefore why should we die? <WH4191> For this great <WH1419> fire <WH784> will consume <WH398> us: <WH8085> if we hear the voice <WH6963> of Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> any more, <WH3254> then we shall die. <WH4191>

For who is there of all flesh, <WH1320> that has heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the living <WH2416> God <WH430> speaking <WH1696> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire, <WH784> as we have, <WH2421> and lived?

Go near, <WH7126> and hear <WH8085> all that Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> shall say: <WH559> and tell <WH559> us all that Yahweh <WH3068> our God <WH430> shall tell <WH1696> you; <WH8085> and we will hear it, <WH6213> and do it."

Yahweh <WH3068> heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of your words, <WH1697> when you spoke <WH1696> to me; <WH3068> and Yahweh said <WH1696> to me, <WH8085> "I have heard the voice <WH6963> of the words <WH1697> of this people, <WH5971> which they have spoken <WH1696> to you: <WH3190> they have well said all that they have spoken. <WH1696>

Oh that there were such <WH2088> a <WH4310> heart <WH3824> in them, <WH5414> that they would fear <WH3372> me, <WH8104> and keep all my commandments <WH4687> always, <WH3117> that it might be well <WH3190> with them, <WH1121> and with their children forever! <WH5769>
"Go <WH3212> tell <WH559> them, <WH7725> Return to your tents. <WH168>

But as for you, <WH5975> stand here by me, <WH5978> and I will tell <WH1696> you all the commandment, <WH4687> and the statutes, <WH2706> and the ordinances, <WH4941> which you shall teach <WH3925> them, <WH6213> that they may do them in the land <WH776> which I give <WH5414> them to possess it. <WH3423>"

You shall observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> therefore as Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has commanded <WH6680> you: <WH5493> you shall not turn aside to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left. <WH8040>

You shall walk <WH3212> in all the way <WH1870> which Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has commanded <WH6680> you, <WH2421> that you may live, and that it may be well <WH2895> with you, <WH748> and that you may prolong your days <WH3117> in the land <WH776> which you shall possess. <WH3423>
